page.title: 11My House
page.content: My house is detached and square. It has eight windows and two doors. The porch is a little roof which keeps the rain from falling round the door. At the side of the house there is a drain- pipe which lets the rain run off the black-tiled roof. The house is made of bricks, cement, wood for the window frame and glass for the actual window. My house has eight rooms. They are the kitchen, dining room, living room, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The kitchen has a washer to wash clothes and a cooker to cook food. There is also a sink where dishes are washed. There is a fridge to keep things cool. In the dining room is a table and four chairs and a television. The living room has a settee, a television, a fire to keep us warm and a wall cabinet.
